resources.string: This application needs special permissions to be able to access calendar notifications. Open Settings app to grant such access?
Enable the app to make Google Calendar event notifications persistent:
This app works by replacing Google Calendar notification with identical looking persistent notifications that would stay in the status bar until dismissed manually
Please note that only event notifications are handled\nThere is no need to handle reminder notification (they don\'t disappear)

Why this app?
This is because Google Calendar Notification would only stay for about an hour and then they disappear.
Not everyone likes this behavior.

How it works?
This app would catch all notifications from Google Calendar and will replace them with identical notifications that would open the same event when clicked

Why reminders are not handled?
Unfortunately format of the notification is different from regular events and they are less documented
At this moment it is safer to don't handle them

There is no need actually - they would stay until marked as 'DONE'
Please re-enable access to notifications to enable functionality of the app
The \'Dismiss\' action will be displayed with each notification, notification would re-appear unless it is dismissed using this button
The \'Snooze\' action will be displayed with each notification allowing you to snooze notification [NOT IMPLEMENTED YET]
Original Google Calendar notification would stay for 3 seconds before it is replaced with Sticky Calendar notification, so it could play sound before disappearing

Alternative solution to issues with original notification sound - you could make this app to play audio reminder on event. Disable \'Delay notification swap\' option if using this one (unless you want double event notifications)
Email developer if you have any feedback or issues:
